This game is amazing. Good characters, deep story, funny and charming jokes, and a fully fleshed out puzzle-maker. If you like action, or some quiet puzzle-solving, this game has something for everyone. 10/10.

Un poco corto, me lo pase en 7 horas, pero es muyy bueno el juego, tiene buena historia y te explica mejor la historia de Portal. Aveces es medio pesado pero es un juego de puzzles, que esperas. Igual recomendadisimo
Fun even for smol brain stupit bro.

not in a million years I would think that I would be touched and so emotional about a PUZZLE game, first look you think people play this game for the game mechanics and the portal gun -I was-, the mechanics and game-play are something to be held, but the STORY oh my the story is phenomenal, from the subtle hints that there is something not right in the setting you are in, the antagonist's rivalry, betrayals, history, Allies, the lore, the music everything is working together softly and perfectly just like the facility you are in with a twist of dark humor that will make you laugh and wonder in the same time.

the ending is so satisfying that it feels weird to even want a sequel, it is a finished full stop to a lightly dark masterpiece that every component in it works as a perfect Swiss watch.
Brilliant idea and implementation. Community is still actively creating content to this day both for single and coop chambers.

If you somehow don't already own this game, you may have a very minor case of serious brain damage, but that can be fixed by buying this game. Bend your brain muscles a bit, enjoy the BRILLIANT dialogue and voice acting and by the end you'll wish there was more to play.

Fun challenge. 
The puzzles get difficult, and it feels great to overcome them.
The physics with portals is pretty cool too. I sometimes found myself playing with the portals for no other reason than it was fun, wasn't even trying to finish the puzzle.
The iconic dialogue is, of course, hilarious.
Great story/story-telling.

For a game as old as it is, it's still fun. I haven't even tried out the coop stuff, but i would definitely recommend this game to anyone who like puzzle games.

If you don't like puzzle games, i would not recommend it. For everyone else, it's a classic.

Played this game with my best friend shortly before his passing in 2017, it will forever be a game I hold close to my heart for this reason. The story mode is exciting and creative but the co-op mode is a whole lot of fun. 

If you like puzzle games, mental challenges and annoying your friends - this is a good co-op game and still stands up on it's own two feet even so many years later. I was late to Portal/Portal 2 but I thoroughly and wholeheartedly recommend it to new players who are on the fence :) 

Happy puzzle-solving!
